bibl.title: News from Smikrines and Pamphile. Two New Fragments of Epitrepontes 786-803 and 812-820 Sandbach-Furley.
bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 4803/26/B17F/A (c). Epitrepontes 786-803. - P. Mich. Inv. 4805/26/B17F/A m. Epitrepontes 812-820. - Both papyrus are fragments relating to Socrates the tax collector, and of the Menander roll of Epitrepontes; they were found in House B17 at Karanis.
bibl.seg: Cornelia Römer, News from Smikrines and Pamphile. Two New Fragments of Epitrepontes 786-803 and 812-820 Sandbach-Furley.

P. Mich. Inv. 4803/26/B17F/A (c). Epitrepontes 786-803. - P. Mich. Inv. 4805/26/B17F/A m. Epitrepontes 812-820. - Both papyrus are fragments relating to Socrates the tax collector, and of the Menander roll of Epitrepontes; they were found in House B17 at Karanis.
